name: Drifting Vroombas Battlegrounds
description:
The machines have gone maximum overdrive... against themselves! Now you are out of control and must drift and shoot your way through the last living room on Earth. Send your rival into the vacuum!

You have 20 seconds to gather as much rubbish as you can gather. After that.... shoot, shoot, shoot!

CONTROLS:

-Player 1:
 + A key: turn left.
 + D key: turn right.
 + Space key: shoot.

-Player 2:
 + Left arrow key: turn left.
 + Right arrow key: turn right.
 + Enter key: shoot.
